LanguageData.DMS_Convert_ComponentIndustrial.label: Convert into component
LanguageData.DMS_Convert_ComponentIndustrial.descript: Convert a stamponent into the more commonly used standard component.
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Artifuscle.label: Grow Artifuscle x25
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Artifuscle.description: Grow strands of artificial muscles which uses plasfiber as skin, tungsteel as bone, gold as neurofilament and neutroamine as blood
LanguageData.DMS_Make_ArtifuscleMass.label: Grow Artifuscle x100
LanguageData.DMS_Make_ArtifuscleMass.description: Grow a large batch of artificial muscles which uses plasfiber as skin, tungsteel as bone, gold as neurofilament and neutroamine as blood
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Ceramics.label: Make Ceramics x20
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Ceramics.description: Create a standard batch of ceramics, useful for armoring autromatroids or as a building material.
LanguageData.DMS_Make_CeramicsMass.label: Make ceramics x80
LanguageData.DMS_Make_CeramicsMass.description: Create a large batch of cermaics, useful for armoring automatroids or as a building material.
LanguageData.DMS_Make_ComponentIndustrial.label: make component
LanguageData.DMS_Make_ComponentIndustrial.description: Make a standard component from the machinery printer, which takes longer time and resources.
LanguageData.DMS_Make_ComponentStamped.label: Make Stamponent
LanguageData.DMS_Make_ComponentStampedMass.label: make stamponent x4
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Plasfiber.label: Make Plasfiber x20
LanguageData.DMS_Make_PlasfiberMass.label: Make Plasfiber x80
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Polyester.label: Make Polyester x50
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Polyester.description: Create a standard bundle of synthetic polyester fibers using chemfuel.
LanguageData.DMS_Make_PolyesterMass.label: Make Polyester x200
LanguageData.DMS_Make_PolyesterMass.description: Create a large bundle of synthetic polyester fibers using chemfuel.
LanguageData.DMS_Make_Tungsteel.label: Make Tungsteel x20
LanguageData.DMS_Make_TungsteelMass.label: Make tungsteel x80
LanguageData.DMS_Make_WetWare.label: Grow Wetware Computer
LanguageData.DMS_Make_WetWare.description: Grow a wetware computer, a high-precision computer that can be produced and used on large scale computations.
